subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Tyrone Lewis scored 24 points to lead the Purple Eagles to a 83-79 victory over Siena to earn an automatic berth to the N.C.A.A. tournament. Niagara last reached the tournament in 2005.
snippet: Tyrone Lewis scored 24 points to lead the Purple Eagles to a 83-79 victory over Siena to earn an automatic berth to the N.C.A.A. tournament. Niagara last reached the tournament in 2005.
